name: Fyooz
short_description: When decentralized finance meets pop culture. Fyooz empowers users to invest in anything you love.
description: When decentralized finance meets pop culture. Fyooz empowers users to invest in anything you love. It can be a artist, brand or influencer. Fyooz combines the power of Social Media with state-of-the-art Fintech solutions â€“ in a decentralized way.
